mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_section ( section_name, section_description, course_id, category_id, date, account_id, delete_flg, first_create_user, first_create_date, last_modified_user, last_modified_date ) VALUES ( #{sectionName}, #{sectionDescription}, #{courseId}, #{categoryId}, #{date}, #{accountId}, #{deleteFlg}, #{firstCreateUser}, #{firstCreateDate}, #{lastModifiedUser}, #{lastModifiedDate} )
